title: Cloaked Despair
story: A suffocating bank of clouds descends upon the castle, isolating its occupants. Each hero feels the oppressive weight of their solitude.
effect: While this card is active, at the end of each hero's turn, if no other hero is in their current room or a directly connected room (a room sharing a border or passage with their current room on the map), that hero loses 1 Willpower. If the hero is in the First Tower Bedroom, Master Bedroom, Second Tower Bedroom, or the Crypt under these conditions, they lose 2 Willpower instead.
